name: 林正釧
objective:
本課程教授熱力學的基本概念與理論，內容涵蓋熱力學的基本定律、封閉系統中的能量分析、系統與環境之間的能量交互作用以及熵分析。
This course provides the principal concepts and fundamental theories of thermodynamics and will cover the basic laws of thermodynamics, the energy analysis in closed systems, the energy interactions between system and environment, and the entropy analysis.
schedule:
週次   單元主題
1. Introduction to Thermodynamics
2-3. General energy analysis
4-5. Properties of a pure substance
6-7. Energy analysis of closed systems
8. Energy analysis of open systems
9. Midterm Exam
10-11. Energy analysis of open systems
12-14. The second law of Thermodynamics
15-17. Entropy analysis
18. Final Exam
materials:
上課講義：自編教材
參考書目: Cengel, Y. A., Boles, M. A. and Kanoglu M., Thermodynamics: An Engineering Approach, 9th edition, McGraw-Hill, 2018
consultation: 學生可利用 office hours 或使用 email (ccl@ntut.edu.tw) 聯繫討論。
課程對應SDGs指標: SDG4：優質教育（Quality Education）SDG7：可負擔的潔淨能源（Affordable and Clean Energy）
remarks: 課程相關事項請參考北科 i 學園。
